mapper.select: select u_id from t_user where u_phone = #{phone} and u_password = MD5(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into t_user(u_id, u_name, u_password, u_real_name, u_phone, u_address) values (UUID(), #{u_name}, MD5(#{u_password}), #{u_real_name}, #{u_phone}, #{u_address})
insert into t_tickets(ti_id, u_id, tr_id, p_id, ti_departure_id, ti_terminal_id, ti_seat) values (UUID(), #{u_id}, #{tr_id}, #{p_id}, #{ti_departure_id}, #{ti_terminal_id}, #{ti_seat})
mapper.select: call querypathlist(#{transit},#{start_station},#{end_station},#{s_date})

SELECT vm.vm_id as vm_id, vm.vm_total as vm_total, vm.vm_name as vm_name,vm.vm_first_class as vm_first_class,vm.vm_second_class as vm_second_class FROM t_trains AS tr JOIN t_vehicle_model AS vm ON tr.vm_id = vm.vm_id WHERE tr_id = #{tr_id}
SELECT seatIsEmpty(#{start_station}, #{end_station}, #{tr_id}, #{seat_id});

WITH recursive r(seat_id, is_empty) AS ( SELECT 1 AS seat_id, seatIsEmpty(#{start_station}, #{end_station}, #{tr_id}, 1) AS is_empty UNION ALL SELECT r.seat_id + 1 AS seat_id, seatIsEmpty(#{start_station}, #{end_station}, #{tr_id}, r.seat_id + 1) AS is_empty FROM r WHERE #{seatCount} > r.seat_id ) SELECT is_empty FROM r;
mapper.insert: insert into t_rob(rob_id, u_id, tr_id, p_id, r_departure_id, r_terminal_id, r_time, r_seat) values (UUID(), #{u_id}, #{tr_id}, #{p_id}, #{r_departure_id}, #{r_terminal_id}, #{r_name}, #{r_seat})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_rob
SELECT * FROM t_price where vm_id=#{vm_id} and p_seat_style=#{p_seat_style} and p_holiday=#{isHoliday}
select t_holiday>0 from t_calendar where t_day=#{localDate};
select * from t_router_train_detail where tr_name=#{tr_name} and start_s_name=#{s_station_name};
select * from t_router_train_detail where tr_name=#{tr_name} and end_s_name=#{e_station_name};
select querydistance(#{s_station_name},#{e_station_name},#{tr_id})
select * from t_rob where u_id=#{u_id}
select * from t_rob where rob_id=#{rob_id}
